gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class ConfiguredScheduledReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ScheduledReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ConfiguredScheduledReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphiteReporter, InfluxDBReporter, MetricReportReporter, OutputStreamReporter

    public abstract class ConfiguredScheduledReporter
extends ScheduledReporter
    Scheduled reporter with metrics reporting configuration.

    Concrete reporters need to subclass this class and implement ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap , SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map) that emits the metrics in the desired (textual/serialized) form.

      • report

        protected void report(SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Gauge> gauges,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Counter> counters,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Histogram> histograms,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Meter> meters,
                      SortedMap<String,com.codahale.metrics.Timer> timers,
                      Map<String,Object> tags,
                      boolean isFinal)
        Description copied from class: ScheduledReporter
        Report the input metrics. The input tags apply to all input metrics.

        The default implementation of this method is to ignore the value of isFinal. Sub-classes that are interested in using the value of isFinal should override this method as well as ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map). If they are not interested in the value of isFinal, they should just override ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map).

        Overrides:
        report in class ScheduledReporter
        isFinal - true if this is the final time report will be called, false otherwise

      • getMetricNamePrefix

        protected String getMetricNamePrefix(Map<String,Object> tags)
        Constructs the prefix of metric key to be emitted. Enriches metricContextName with the current task id and fork id to be able to identify the emitted metric by its origin
        Parameters:
        tags -
        Returns:
        Prefix of the metric key

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Description copied from class: ContextAwareReporter
        Removes ContextAwareReporter records from the RootMetricContext. This method should be considered irreversible and destructive to the ContextAwareReporter.
        Specified by:
